arts.ttl: Southend get play-off push back on course with victory over Oldham
arts.sum: Keenan Appiah-Forson headed the only goal of the game in the eighth minute.

arts.ttl: Former Southend United youth coach jailed for sexually abusing young players
arts.sum: Former Southend United FC youth coach Derek Hinchliffe had been jailed for sexually abusing teenage boys he met at the club
